column3: Click on the “From” city input field.
Type “New Delhi” and select from the dropdown.
Click on the “To” city input field.
Type “Mumbai” and select from the dropdown.
Click on the departure date field.
Select a date 7 days from today on the calendar.
Wait for the flight results page to load.
Click on the first listed flight option.
Verify that the booking summary displays “New Delhi to Mumbai”.
